outcome: A mysterious figure emerges, seeking to gain control over the BCI system.

events.description: A shadowy figure calling themselves 'The Architect' begins leaking obscure but seemingly authoritative BCI blueprints online.
The Council starts an internal investigation to track the source of the breach, fearing sabotage.
Encrypted message boards discuss 'The Architect' as a potential savior, promising to return control to the people.
Directorate proposes a classified project to counteract 'The Architect,' focusing on reestablishing system integrity.
